phrases: (yeah that is worded pretty much like a cliche, edit as you want)
What does she mean, she saw through her?
Today, we are stopping by Ai-chan's as well!
Shinichirou, lend me your English dictionary.
Alright, it is in my locker.
This example here is one of the basics of functions,
I would hope that everyone here is able to solve these in a quick manner, so memorize them well.
Is it Isurugi Noe that gave you those red seeds?
That is what you call love, right?
She is just showing how much she loves you with those red seeds!
I think I am just cursed.
A date after school is it?
Just a few words of complaint.
Be careful not to get eaten up!
Why is she running that fast?
He is picking her up on a bike...
Oh, he said he will come over in a moment.
These are treats for the local community school.
Seems to me they are really delicious!
I will go get you two some drinks...
You know, you really do like dropped food.
I will eat any food fallen on the ground, as long as it is made by Ai-chan!
Sooner or later you will get a stomach ache!
I have no regrets from that since it is Ai-chan's cooking that I ate!
Then why is she reaching out to you?
She is just using me as a replacement for Raigou-maru.
A chicken in the school's backyard...
So that means, those red seeds are...
That means she sees you as a chicken, huh?
She does not see me that way.
I have got to go home!
We will take this shortcut since we are a bit late.
What we talked about the other day...
Who did you hear that from?
She told me she wants to be a friend of Noe's.
But in truth, that is not the case, is it?
But, I am not telling you.
Let me take care of it.
One person can only get close to another person when she is in love with him, right?
What if, you want to get close to that person, but at the same time, that could not happen?
Since someone is already beside him...
It must be a pain in the butt for the girls that fall in love with you.
For example, if Hiromi fell in love with someone,
and close to that person is Noe...
But... there is no one else!
Seems like you are quite happy.
Oh... err... it is actually facial exercises.
I heard it improves your health by shifting it to the sides.
I need you to deliver this.
But you continue to behave rudely.
This is the sake for Amimoto-ojisan's celebration.
We promised that we would deliver it by today.
Why did the two of them go out?
They are taking something over to Oji-san's.
Shin-chan does not have to go too...
Well, I think it is fine to let Shinichirou handle that.
Hiromi's now a child of our household,
You did not have to come with me...
This street is dark and dangerous.
You do not need to worry about it too much,
Since you are not a maid.
Right now, I am under the care of your family...
Oh yeah, we once walked this street, right?
You got lost on the day of the festival,
Hey, by the way, what did you mean yesterday with Noe seeing through you?
Actually, it is really scary to walk this street.
Do not leave me alone, Shinichirou-kun...
At the moment that I have decided to live in this family,
When it was decided I was to live in this house.
Do not leave me alone, huh?
What a shock that she does not remember...
After all, it was one step forward for us to walk together in the streets.
Wanting to hold your hand, I extended mine.
At that moment, snow started to fall.
I am just going to prepare for the basketball competitions.
Well, err... when the time comes, I will go cheer for you.
I am going back to sleep for a little longer.
What are you planning to do?
Well, since I have nothing else to do, I will go take a look.
I told you, I do not want the red seeds!
That is not your choice to make.
You know, I do not have a clue what you want, but...
Would not it be better if you did not get too involved with me?
I saw you together with him!
That is why, know your place!
( should not it be That is why, stop doing this!
You climbed up yourself, get down by yourself.
Come on, back on your feet.
Soon, there will be a cockroach...
Soon, there will be a cockroach on top of Shinichirou's head...
On Shinichirou's back there is a cockroach too...
You know what is over there?
Dude, what the hell were you doing?
So you mistook her brother for her boyfriend!
I think hoo hoo could be translated to I see, but this way it is a bit more obvious he is taunting him
Well, not like it is unusual.
At least confirm it first next time!
It is not that big of a deal.
Not like I care if she has a boyfriend or not.
That is true, but seems to me that this is one less trouble for you.
You bastard! ( or Do not be Stupid Miku-chan) (Edit - Miku-chan is correct)
Since you have Yuasa Hiromi in your hands.
Do not just decide on your own!
You better think of a reason real quick.
Just now, when you were carrying Noe, she got a good look at you.
That will most likely end up as a misunderstanding.
Why must I find a reason?
Excuse me, can you pass me the ball?
Did you see that just now?
Hey, is that really fine with you?
Come on, Hiromi, seriously, do not you like Nakagami-kun?
She suddenly fell down from the tree...
Somehow I am feeling like I was the one at fault here!
I would not lie to Tomoyo about that.
The person I like is Hotarugawa's No. 4.
So, please do not mention Shinichirou-kun's name again.
Um, could it be you are hiding from me?
